GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.20 to before v4.14.291
GSD.description:
powerpc/spufs: Fix refcount leak in spufs_init_isolated_loader

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 43584490ee6c8a104797444af6bf89d0dafe95c0, it was introduced in version v2.6.20 by commit 0afacde3df4c9980f505d9afd7cb0058389732ca. For more details please see the references link.
